channel.title: WWII on Klara Łuczka-Hanzalová
channel.description: Recent content in WWII on Klara Łuczka-Hanzalová

item.title: How the idea for a novel was born
item.description: Since childhood, the history of my hometown has profoundly impacted my imagination. Wandering around the streets of Warsaw, every footstep was permeated by the weight of the past, the scars left on the city during the Second World War. A city once enslaved by the German Nazi invaders, its buildings still carry the impressions, both tangible and invisible, of fervent combat. I remember developing a fascination for a symbol depicted on countless memorial plaques and walls.
